As of today the US has reported 9.38 million COVID cases and 231,000 COVID deaths. The mortality rate is:231/9,380 = 0.0246= 2.4%For seasonal flu in 2018 & 2019the mortality rate was 0.1%. COVID is far more contagious & far more lethal than seasonal flu. Don't take it lightly!
